text:
Ah... It's the macaron fair...!
Looks delicious...!

I think I'll get this one too.
It seems fun to order different flavors and share.
When I was little, I saw the names of macarons in a book...

I wondered what kind of sweets they were...
and I remembered a little.

Is that so...! That's why I want to tell the me from back then,
that it's just as she imagined it would be...
